message: I'm excited to offer you the product for $12000. I think it's a great deal considering its value to you is $8000. Let me know if you're interested!
Thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $9500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to propose a price of $11000. Let me know if this is more to your liking!
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500 for the product. I hope this proposal is closer to what you're looking for.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm still a bit above my target, but I'm willing to meet you at $11200. This is my final offer, so I hope you can make it work!
